Initial commit: StudioFlow - Gym Display Management System

Features:
- Backend API with Express.js and Socket.IO
- Frontend with Next.js 15 and TypeScript

- Override system with repeat count functionality
- Automatic video duration detection
- Real-time display updates via WebSocket
- Lesson and instructor management
- QR code generation for lessons
- Test scenario with 5-minute override sequence

Tech Stack:
- Backend: Node.js, Express.js, Socket.IO
- Frontend: Next.js 15, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- State Management: Zustand
- Real-time: Socket.IO
